data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Karimnagar, Telangana, India that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Karimnagar, Telangana, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Karimnagar, Telangana, India to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Karimnagar, Telangana, India that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.
Father, bring yourself glory in Karimnagar. Through your servants plant 196 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Lord, we pray for the believers in Karimnagar, Telangana, India to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Karimnagar, Telangana, India. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Please, convict the 10,817 believers in Karimnagar, Telangana, India to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

location.name: Karimnagar
location.people_groups_list: Padigarajulu, Balija Musugu, Balija Bogam, Banjara Charan, Gosangi (Muslim traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Padigarajulu (1,000), Balija Musugu (21,000), Balija Bogam (75,000), Banjara Charan (111,000), Gosangi (Muslim traditions) (500)
